message: I have a feeling that iPad 2 will be sold out for awhile just like the iPhone 4. I'll be getting the white16 WiFi how about you?
I have the white 64 GB. I couldn't wait the two weeks.
@Lyle Welcome to the club ( or cult depending on who you ask ).

I just passed by our main apple store in MTL today, making sure they are still on track for the lunch, and they are. They wouldn't say much I could only squeez out some info like the 2 limit per person and and pricing will be the same as last years iPad in Canada. I mean now that us and Can $ are the same they should just sell it at $499.

@justinluey, not at all.  I hardly notice it and when I do, it's in the context of how much pleasure I get from it …from both a technological and anesthetic point of view.  I like how everything comes together - both the iPad and the smart cover.  I got the leather navy.
@marle Now, I'm tempted. White and navy are my favorite colors. Pretty much every shirt and hoodie I own is white, or navy, or both.
@Lyle congratulations on the 4. You'll love the 2 if and when you get it.
I'd die for an iPad but chose to get the iPhone 4 with Verizon. Have to save up for iPad 2 but absolutely will. This was my first apple product and I'm a changed man.
@marle I'm hoping to get the black 16 gig wifi, but if sold out I'd take white.

@justinluey I was tempted by the black and the red but I think that I got the perfect combo for me.  I can't believe how much enjoyment I get from using it and looking at it. Definitely a win-win for me.  It probably helped that I knew what capacity I wanted but I wasn't as wed to any other particular option.
@justinluey I didn't have a choice, I took what was available.  I can't believe how much more I like it than my old black one.  It's very classy.
@marle You don't find the white bezel distracting?

Black or white that is the question? I always wanted flto get the white iPhone 4 but thank god I didnt wait for it, now I want to get the white iPad I don't know, for sure it will get dirty faster I mean it'll show it faster, but still.
anyone's lining up for the iPad?
I heard it doesn't matter if it's black or white. :)
I'm lining up at the apple store in downtown Toronto!
@laurentlogan good luck!
Thanks gonna seriously need it! I think im gonna have to camp outside the store Thursday nite to get a crack at the iPad friday morning
Anyone camped out before outside an applestore before? Any tips?
@laurentlogan what does it go on sale. Only 12:00 here, in the states here
This friday
Im
Get black, as white will show dirt easier. Love my black iPad 2.
I'm not sure but hopefully when the store opens at 9am
It's hard plastic, I don't think that part will be a huge problem.
Thanks guys!
I just hope Rogers comes out with a decent data sharing plan cause u do want the 3G model
I don't want to compromise my iPhone 4a battery life after hotspotting for many hours...the only reason i don't jailbreak is the battery drain
You really dont need 3G if you have an iPhone 4 and personal hotspot
And I meant 'I do want  the 3G' in my second last post lol
Not waiting inline for a IPad2
@johncpiercy give me your money and I'll wait in line for you. As long as I can hold it for a little while
I didn't buy Ipad1 , still not sure I need one !  Will buy someday !
@johncpiercy not sure you need one? How does one breathe if there is no air! lol
@Lyle you're hilarious unfortunately I know exactly what you mean
G'nite goodnight
